name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Portable 2
summary:
Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable 2 covers Banquet of the Golden Witch and Alliance of the Golden Witch. It was released on November 17, 2011.

Its cover features EVA-Beatrice and Ange Ushiromiya.

Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable is a port of the second half of the PlayStation 3 remake of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Question Arcs on PlayStation Portable.

The PSP versions of Umineko were planned to be split into four separate releases, each one containing two episodes of the full story. Due to the bankruptcy of Alchemist, it is safe to assume that the Portable adaptations of Chiru have been cancelled.
